extShortDesc.description: this will be in the chrome web store: must be 132 characters or less
extShortDesc.message: Avoid redirects and has direct access to the sites you want to visit.

highlightLink.message: Highlight active link on the page

replaceTargetUrl1.message: 1: Always show menu and replace URL of the link

replaceTargetUrl2.message: 2: Always show menu and replace URL if link has only one redirect

replaceTargetUrl3.message: 3: Show menu if link has more than one redirect and always replace URL of the link

replaceTargetUrl4.message: 4: Show menu if link has more than one redirect and replace URL if link has only one redirect

useFallbackRule1.message: Replace URL by rules and use an alternate fallback method if no rules is set

keyboard_tip.message:
The option "Keyboard shortcut to show the menu" controls the menu visibility.
Usage:
*  Press while the cursor is over any link in the page.
** Press while click any icon on menu popup.

keysShowPopup.message: Keyboard shortcut to show the menu

keysPreventReferrer.message: Stop link from sending referrer. Useful to avoid 403/Forbidden pages

maxCaptureRecursion.message: Maximum capture recursion depth on a single link

watchNodeInserted.message: Check content inserted, after page load

siterules_tip.message:
Rules also are added by using the shortcut set in General > Keys > Add rule to the link.

Patterns: URL of the link (use * as wildcard). Use <tld> to matches any TLD (com, org, net, gov...).

Parameters:
1. Any query string parameter.
   Example: imgrefurl matches ...&imgrefurl=http://example.com.
2. @attribute-name: matches an attribute.
   Example: @onclick, @onmouseover...
3. *.extension: matches a extension.
   Example: *.jpg, *.mp4...
4. #extraction-method: matches a extraction method (#base64, #hex, #reverse, #text, #javascript, #forced).
5. Parameters except extensions can be mixed in the same field with commas.
   Example: "@attribute,src" matches if contains @attribute followed by src.
   Does not work: "@attribute,*.avi", "*.mp3,*.avi"...

The processing order of the rules is according as they are shown on configuration page.
